Package de.hshl.obj.loader

Provides a simple API for the core functionality of this library.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Resource.Environment
    A Environment represents a group of related files, for example a folder or a jar resource folder.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MTLLoader
    Load MTL files into an MTL object.
    OBJLoader
    Extract geometry and material data from OBJ files.
    Resource
    Because OBJ files can reference MTL files in the same folder, it is not enough to know the file location of the OBJ file, but it is also required to know where all related files are located.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OBJLoader.StructureKind
    Which kind of Structures should be extracted from the file: OBJ Groups or OBJ Objects.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DecodingException
    Indicates that decoding a file has gone wrong and the process has been aborted.
    DecodingException.ConversionException  
    DecodingException.NotSupported  

Package de.hshl.obj.loader Description

Provides a simple API for the core functionality of this library. It contains the OBJLoader and MTLLoader classes, which are the entry point for nearly all library uses.

This package also contains algorithms which convert the loaded OBJ data to generic, OpenGL-friendly data in standard Java types like float[] and int[].
Author:
Johannes Vollmer
